name: Acute Lower Back Strain
chief_complaint: I have sharp pain in my lower back that started after lifting heavy boxes yesterday
physical_findings: tenderness on palpation of lumbar paraspinal muscles
limited range of motion in lumbar spine
prognosis: Excellent with proper rest and treatment, typically resolves within 2-4 weeks
description: A common musculoskeletal condition caused by overstretching or tearing of muscles and ligaments in the lower back, often due to improper lifting or sudden movements
